FuncDef: This command displays statistics for RSVP interfaces at the configured interval until the configured count is reached.
CLIs: interface <interface> [ interface ] [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address of the interface (ip-address) or interface name (ip-int-name). Up to five interfaces can be specified. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes. Values-ip-int-name, ip-address.
Configures the interval for each display, in seconds. Values-3 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic instead of the delta.
